document.title: Hot Topic: Energy Code Adoption by the State of Tennessee and Its Effects on Cities (2009)
document.abstract: This Hot Topic analyzes the new energy code legislation; describes what the state of Tennessee is doing to prepare for implementation of this law and how cities can prepare; and outlines the resources MTAS will provide to assist cities in this process.
